<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/copyas"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Copies (and converts if possible) an existing file to the specified folder.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"File id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"File","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"destTitle":{"type":"string","description":"Destination file title","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"destFolderId":{"oneOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}],"description":"Destination folder ID"},"enableExternalExt":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to allow the creation of external extension files or not","example":true},"password":{"type":"string","description":"Password","nullable":true,"example":"vfmf2vO1Kp"},"toForm":{"type":"boolean","description":"Convert to form","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Parameters for copying a file","title":"ASC.Files.Core.ApiModels.RequestDto.CopyAs.System.Text.Json.JsonElement"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
